content:
INetworkProgress Interface

Definition

Provides information on network progress in sending data over the network.

In this Article

[System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)]
[System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)]
public interface INetworkProgress

Events

ProgressChanged

Network progress has changed.

public event EventHandler<System.Net.NetworkProgressChangedEventArgs> ProgressChanged;

ProgressCompleted

Network progress has completed.

public event EventHandler<System.Net.NetworkProgressChangedEventArgs> ProgressCompleted;

ProgressFailed

Network progress has failed.

public event EventHandler<System.Net.NetworkProgressChangedEventArgs> ProgressFailed;
